            int y1,
            int x2,
            int y2)

        Parameters:
        x1 - current tile's x coordinate
        y1 - current tile's y coordinate
        x2 - target tile's x coordinate
        y2 - target tile's y coordinate

      • tileClicked

        public void tileClicked(int x,
               int y)
        Update the board based on the user's action. First check if the tile at the specified x and y has a valid movement. If it does, update the temporary board and check if the movement is valid. If the movement is valid, update the current board, and set the flag to draw the board.
        Parameters:
        x - tile's x coordinate
        y - tile's y coordinate

      • canMove

        private TileMovement canMove(int x,
                   int y)
        Check if a tile has an adjacent empty space to move to.
        Parameters:
        x - the tile x coordinate
        y - the tile y coordinate
        Returns:
        the direction that the tile can be moved to, null otherwise

      • isBoardSolved

        public boolean isBoardSolved()
        Check if the current board configuration is solved. The board is considered solved if the values of the tiles are in increasing values.
        Returns:
        true if the board's tiles are in increasing order

      • solveBoard

        public void solveBoard()
        Solve the current board.

      • scrambleBoard

        public void scrambleBoard()
        Generate a new game board and scramble it. -1 value set to represent the blank tile.

      • addBoardEventListener

        public void addBoardEventListener(BoardEventListener listener)
        Register a listener for board changes such as moved tiles or board being solved
        Parameters:
        listener - event handler

      • notifyBoardChange

        private void notifyBoardChange()
        Notify registered listeners of a board change. Triggered when a tile is moved or when it has been reinitialized.

      • notifyBoardSolved

        private void notifyBoardSolved()
        Notify registered listeners that the current board configuration has been solved.

      • getUserMoves

        public int getUserMoves()
        Get the number of valid user moves in the current board
        Returns:
        number of user moves

      • getBoard

        public Tile[][] getBoard()
        Return the current board's tiles.
        Returns:
        gameboard's tiles.
